messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Ceramonial Drum
messages.msgSnippet: To add to the discussion. Heaven and Earth was film in Longview, Alberta, Canada just southwest of Calgary, Alberta. You might be able to find some set pieces
messages.messageBody:
To add to the discussion. Heaven and Earth was film in Longview, Alberta, Canada just southwest of Calgary, Alberta. You might be able to find some set pieces still kicking around in Calgary. As the their authenticity ... I cannot say.

R. Omura

I'd die for my beliefs but I might be wrong. -- Bertrand Russell

arsenalmini <jsmcc91@...> wrote:
I am looking for information about a type of drum that was used in
the film Heaven and Earth that was carried into battle in the film. I
am not sure if there is a historical reference to this, but a
wargaming company would like to add this item to their 15mm Samurai
range. Thanks in advance.

Jay

messages.messageBody:
I am looking for information about a type of drum that was used in
the film Heaven and Earth that was carried into battle in the film. I
am not sure if there is a historical reference to this, but a
wargaming company would like to add this item to their 15mm Samurai
range. Thanks in advance.
